org.jogger.http
Interface Request.BodyParser

Enclosing interface:
Request
public static interface Request.BodyParser

This is what we returned when the Request.getBody() is called. Provides convenient methods to parse the request body.

Author:
German Escobar

Method Summary
 InputStream asInputStream()
           
 String asString()
          Returns the body of the request as a string.
 

Method Detail

asString

String asString()
Returns the body of the request as a string.

Returns:
a String object with the body.

asInputStream

InputStream asInputStream()
Returns:
the body as an InputStream.
